ai-tha-ap519:0.3_0: Hermits over the seniors, flowers, and goes with seniors.
ai-tha-ap519:2.4_0: the undefiled ones who have crossed the flood.
ai-tha-ap519:3.2_0: having raising his joined palms to him.
ai-tha-ap519:3.3_0: I bowed down to the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap519:3.4_0: He is the great hermit with the great hermit.
ai-tha-ap519:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap519:5.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap519:7.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap519:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kakuṭi.
